title: event
description: Triggers an event for the specified entity or entities.

fields.title: target
fields.description: Required. A `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify which entity the event is happening to.

fields.title: eventName
fields.description: Required. A `string` that specifies the in-game event.

overloads.title: Event triggered for target
overloads.description: Trigger an event of type `eventName` for a `target`.
